question: My mother has HBsAg (-), Anti-HBs(-), Anti-HBc(+),Anti-HAV-Igm(-), Anti-HAV-IgG(+). She just got an ultrasound of the liver and the result is slightly hepatomegaly with fatty infiltration of the liver or liver parenchymal disease. Her SGPT is 73.0  She also have a type II diabetes (glucose=119)Does she definitely have Hepatitis B or is it a different type?
title: Determining what kind of hepatitis?
